title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring on the left hand of a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring on the left hand of a married womanInterpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring on the left hand of a married woman Sometimes a person may have disturbing dreams in his dream that make him feel very uncomfortable when he wakes up from sleep, because these disturbing dreams can affect the psychological state . The psychological state of the person. The mood prevails to some extent throughout the day. You can follow the article on the interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring on the left hand of a married woman via: VariousInterpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring on the left handInterpretation of dreams about wearing a gold ring on the left hand of a married woman When you wear a golden ring in your dream home, it means that you You love a rich and generous person and you wear a metal that you will soon be attached to, but remove the ring from your finger. This is a sign of separation. But if a girl sees that the girl she likes is buying her a ring, this is a sign that she will get married soon and this is good news for her. Wearing gold rings is a sign of good information for them. If he sees a single woman wearing a golden ring on her right hand, this is a sign of sadness. Because sleeping in a dream is an undesirable thing, but it is a dream if she wears the ring and is happy, then this is a sign of sadness. This is an indication of the next joining date. If the ring is silver, it indicates that you will have a lot of wealth, a lot of good things will happen in your life, you will excel in your work and your desires will come true. If a married woman dreams of wearing a gold ring on her left hand, this indicates that she is suffering from some problems in her life, but these problems do not last long. But if a man sees in a dream that he is wearing a gold ring, this indicates serious problems and problems in his life, because gold is not liked by a person in reality or in a dream, and it leads to bad things. One of the However, she will marry him soon as soon as he proves her success in life. Interpretation of a dream of wearing two gold rings for a married womanInterpretation of a dream of wearing a gold ring on her left hand Married, for a married woman who sees that she has a gold ring on her right hand, this indicates that she will live a happy life With her husband and she will be happy because her husband is a man who loves her. maximum. However, if she sees that her husband is wearing a ring on her hand, this is a sign that she will become pregnant soon, and if she sees that the pregnant woman is wearing a ring on her right hand, then she will give birth. If she gives birth to a son and sees that her left hand has a golden ring, this is evidence that she will give birth to a son and a son, God willing. He is in good health, and God knows best. But if a single woman sees a ring on her right hand in a dream, this indicates the presence of a romantic relationship with a respectable person, especially if the ring is of great importance. The ring is a sign of purity. However, if a married woman sees her daughter wearing a ring on her hand, this is a sign that she will be happy in her life. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a married woman wearing a gold ring in her dream means that she will move from her home to a new home

title: Secrets of interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream, good and bad

preview.html: This encyclopedia article presents an interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream, which is a dream that many people repeat during their sleep, and they are unable to interpret it and understand what it may indicate, and rain is better than God. The Wise Mention: God Almighty said in Surat Al-Anfal, verse 11 (And He will send upon you water from the sky to purify you thereby), and the dream of walking in the rain is a strange dream that the dreamer wants to discover. What does he see that his vision leads to, and does it mean evil or good? In the following lines of the encyclopedia, we take into account the different interpretations of the vision of walking in the rain for those interested, single and married, and light rain and heavy rain through what scientists have reached in the interpretation of dreams. Interpretation of walking in the rain In a dream, Ibn Sirin says: The dreamer walked in the rain and the rain was strong, indicating comfort, the removal of worries, and the answer to prayers. Light rain is evidence of sustenance and blessings in the dreamer’s life. Washing with rain water indicates repentance and forgiveness of sins. When a person sees in his dream that he is walking In the rain and bathing with water, this means that his engagement or marriage is imminent. A dream of walking in the rain accompanied by begging is good news for its owner that his begging will be answered. If a person sees in his dream that he is walking in the rain and the rain hits his clothes, then the vision here is good news for him that the worries and problems that he is suffering from The dream will disappear. When a person sees himself in a dream walking in the rain and suffering from financial hardship, the dream indicates that this crisis will end and he will be able to pay off his debts as a result of the abundance of livelihood that God will send him to him. This vision also indicates that the dreamer achieves what he wants in life, whether It was a new job or a promotion at work. Whoever dreams that he is walking in the rain and is rich, the vision symbolizes that the dreamer will obtain many good deeds as a result of giving money to the poor. One of the warning visions is a dream of walking in the rain, but the dreamer was carrying an umbrella to protect him from rainwater. This means that the dreamer is not happy in his life as a result of his sins, disobedience, and distance from God Almighty, and the vision here is a message to him about the need to reconsider his actions and return to the path of guidance. Ibn Sirin also interpreted this vision as an indication of the dreamer’s victory over his oppressor if he is wronged, and his salvation from his imprisonment. If he is imprisoned. Walking in the rain in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Dream interpretation scholar Ibn Shaheen says: If someone sees in his dream that he is walking in the rain and it falls on him alone, then this dream foretells to him that there will be a lot of money on his way to him. Among Ibn Shaheen’s interpretations of this dream is that The person with the vision gained a lot of money as a result of entering into a partnership with someone. Walking in the rain in a dream Al-Nabulsi From the point of view of the interpreter Sheikh Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi, walking in the rain in a dream is one of the visions that warns the dreamer of difficulties and problems. Al-Nabulsi also interpreted this vision as a sign To the fact that the dreamer is looking for a living and follows the path of righteousness in his life, and if the dreamer is married, then the dream indicates that the dreamer’s family is characterized by cohesion, justice, and piety. If one sees in his dream that rain has fallen on

title: Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of eating fried fish in a dream for a married woman. It was believed that seeing fish in a dream is a beautiful dream that gives many positive elements to the dreamer. Especially eating fried fish in a dream for a married woman is evidence of many things that make the dreamer feel satisfied. The interpretation of seeing a lot of dead fish for a married woman is evidence of her life. Beautiful, full of happiness. Delicious fried fish for a married woman is evidence of her life full of love and romance between her and her husband. The life of married women will improve, and it will change for the better and for the better, and this is what you will see clearly after this dream. Interpretation of seeing the symbol of a fish in a dream. A place believed to see fish in a dream. It is one of the signs that It indicates abundant nutrition, peace of mind, and happiness in the dreamer’s soul. Interpretation of a large fish that is in excellent condition and has a wonderful taste is evidence of the wonderful and happy life that the dreamer lives. Interpretation of eating raw fish in a dream is evidence of a difficult life full of problems and challenges for the dreamer. If someone dreams of raw food with your name, it is evidence of betrayal by his friends. To him, and he must beware of them, and have the courage to confront them. Interpretation of the symbol: A small fish in a dream is evidence that there are no problems around the dreamer and that he will leave him soon. The symbol of the fish for a divorced woman is strong evidence of her imminent wedding date with someone she has loved for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about fish For married people: A dream about fish states that married people have many positive interpretations that include a life full of happiness, kindness, blessings, love, and romance. A dream about eating fish: Couples have evidence of the wonderful and special romantic life they live. God will honor the dreamer with a child soon, and he will be a good and intelligent son. Interpretation of fish dreams for married people is more than once evidence of Their love for each other and their great desire to continue the marriage. A married woman’s dream of eating fish with her husband is evidence of his intense love for her. A man’s interpretation of eating fish with his wife while feeding her is a testimony to the sincerity of life between them. Interpretation of a dream about a big fish in a dream states that a dream about a big fish is for a man’s promotion at work And the decent life that he lives with his wife and the wealth that will be his share. Dreams about fish. Its strange shape indicates many challenges facing the dreamer and the need to prepare to face all of these challenges. Dreaming of a large dead fish indicates the troubles and bad luck that beset the dreamer, the endless problems of his life and many Fears that haunt him. Seeing yourself giving a fish in a dream. Many interpreters say that giving fish is a wonderful dream that proves that the dreamer has kindness and generosity to everyone around him. Interpretation of a dream about live fish indicates that seeing a live fish is the owner of many possessions and money that the dreamer will enjoy and will soon be his share. Interpretation Seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says: Seeing dead fish in the sea is a bad sign for a sick person, unlike someone who sees live fish, which indicates benefit and goodness coming to him. And whoever sees himself catching only a small fish, this is

title: Interpretation of treasure in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing treasure in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about prospecting for treasure Treasure: I dreamed that I found treasure: Seeing Pharaonic antiquities in a dream: Interpretation of a dream about buried gold: Underground treasure: Interpretation of a dream about extracting gold from the ground: Treasure in a dream for a single woman: Seeing footprints in a dream: Interpretation of treasure in a dream: Imam Nabulsi says that if a person dreams that he finds a treasure, but there is little money inside this Treasure, this means that this person will face a small crisis, but if the person sees in a dream a lot of money, this is evidence that he will experience great sadness and may indicate the death of the person who had the vision. Treasure in visions and the world of dream interpretation indicates that the woman is pregnant, because gold in The dream is two boys and a silver maid. Treasure in a dream indicates abundance and abundance of money, and it is for knowledge, knowledge and gathering of the world. Treasure in a merchant or businessman's dream is sustenance and profit. It has been said: Treasure is a sign of martyrdom, and treasures are the deeds that the dreamer acquires or acquires after traveling. Whoever sees in his dream a treasure containing money, he will be affected by it in wakefulness, or it indicates prestige or power. Treasure is victory or success. It was said that there is a book of healing. It is said that a woman saw her daughter dead and said to her, “My daughter, what deeds did you find to be good?” The girl replied: You eat walnuts, so give them to the poor. He told this dream to Ibn Shirin, and he said: This woman takes her treasure and gives it in charity. The woman replied: May God forgive me, for I have a treasure that I have buried since the days of the plague. He saw a man three times in a row, as if a man had come to him and said to him: Go to Basra, for you have a treasure there, carry it. For days he saw nothing of what the phone told him, so he gave up and blamed himself for all the responsibilities, then entered an abandoned or dilapidated house. He searched through it until he found a notebook, which he took out and then looked at it. He knew nothing about it, and it was written in Hebrew, and he could not find anyone in Basra to read or translate it, so he took it to a young man from the people of Baghdad. So he translated it for him and it was a valuable or valuable book in the arts of speech or expression. Interpretation of treasure in a ruler’s dream: If a ruler sees in a dream that he has found a large treasure, this means that he will lose his rule, or if someone sees that he has found a treasure but does not know what the treasure contains, then this It means that that person will get a lot of money and become rich. But if a person sees in his dream that he has found a treasure, and is unable to reach it, this means that this person does not pay zakat, and this may indicate that he is very stingy. She will bear him children. Or if this treasure is silver, then this indicates the birth of daughters. Interpretation of treasure in a married woman’s dreamDream interpreters say that if a married woman sees in her dream that her husband has obtained a large treasure, this means that there are many problems between her and her husband. You will become pregnant soon. Interpretation of buried treasure in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars say that if a person sees in a dream that there is a buried treasure of precious jewels and jewelry, this means that he will obtain a lot of money. But if someone dreams in a dream that he saw a buried treasure but it is not his. Valuable, and it is preserved

But if a person sees in his dream that he has found a treasure, and is unable to reach it, this means that this person does not pay zakat, and this may indicate that he is very stingy. She will bear him children. Or if this treasure is silver, then this indicates the birth of daughters. Interpretation of treasure in a married woman’s dreamDream interpreters say that if a married woman sees in her dream that her husband has obtained a large treasure, this means that there are many problems between her and her husband. You will become pregnant soon. Interpretation of buried treasure in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars say that if a person sees in a dream that there is a buried treasure of precious jewels and jewelry, this means that he will obtain a lot of money. But if someone dreams in a dream that he saw a buried treasure but it is not his. Valuable, and it is preserved

title: Interpretation of decorations in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: A dream about decoration in a dream, for single women, for pregnant women, for divorced women, whether they hang ornaments on occasions and holidays, or decorate themselves, hang wedding decorations at home, see Ibn Sirin’s decorative plant and more. Decoration in a dream carries for us many verses and symbols, explained by the interpreter Ibn Sirin. There are many interpretations. Interpretation of adornment in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Adornment in a dream indicates poverty and corruption. Whoever sees the world decorated for him, and everything he asks for will become poor and perish. Adornment in a country where adornment is not known is good for everyone. Interpretation of adornment in a dream by Ibn Kathir. Interpreters believe that seeing an ornamental plant shows kindness and is one of the praiseworthy visions in the dreamer’s dream. Seeing ornamental plants cut and cleaned is a sign of positive changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life, which is A sign of good luck. In general, seeing an ornamental plant indicates food and money, and it is good news for success and prosperity in the dreamer’s career. Interpretation of ornamental plants in a dream for a single woman: Seeing ornamental plants is considered one of the most promising and praiseworthy visions in a single girl’s dream. Seeing pruning ornamental plants In a girl’s dream, it symbolizes positive changes and enjoyable events that will occur in her life. Seeing a girl getting ornamental plants is an indication of the success and success she will enjoy in her life, whether in study or work, and it may indicate an engagement, betrothal, or marriage for the girl, God willing. Soon. Also, seeing her cleaning and cutting ornamental plants in a dream also symbolizes her share of goodness, and it is a sign of the joy and happiness that the girl will experience, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. It is evil to see an ornamental plant, or to see the rejection of an ornamental plant, or to be unable to obtain it. In a dream, it indicates the difficulties that a girl faces in her life, and God knows best. Interpretation of ornaments in a dream for a married woman: Seeing ornamental plants in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate happiness, joy, and stability in a woman’s life. Seeing taking care of ornamental plants, cleaning them, and pruning them is one of the visions that indicate that The woman will receive an abundance of goodness and happiness, and it is a harbinger of good fortune, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. Also, the vision of buying or planting ornamental plants can indicate success and prosperity in the husband’s career, and it is good news of an imminent pregnancy, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of ornamental plants in a dream For a pregnant woman: Seeing ornamental plants in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a girl, and God Almighty knows what is in the wombs. As for seeing in a dream that you are pruning, cleaning, and cutting ornamental plants, it is a sign that the woman’s condition is easy and that it is good news of good health for her and her newborn, God willing. In the overall interpretation of the pregnant woman Seeing ornamental plants is a good, praiseworthy and promising vision in the life of a pregnant woman, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing.

title: Interpretation of seeing cats and mice in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cats and mice in a dream. Cats are pets that we see in our daily lives on an ongoing basis. As for mice, they are annoying creatures that many people do not want, so the interpretation of seeing a dream. Each of these is the desire to know many people because one of the upcoming dreams that Many people wonder about it, and therefore deepening knowledge of the interpretation of many different dreams and visions has become one of the most important things in the public eye for many people, as dreams differ from one person to another, and the nature of the dream varies, and the reason for this is because it consists of a group of fantasies that appear to a person during his sleep, and in Below we learn many different information about the interpretation of seeing cats and mice in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of seeing cats and mice in a dream. Many people want to know the interpretation of seeing a dream about both cats and mice, and this is the reason for their presence in the dream, and therefore we learn about the interpretation of the dream through a group of The following points that we present to you are as follows: Whoever sees a mouse in his dream, this indicates kindness and food, and that the dreamer expects to obtain a lot of money. Whoever observes or sees the presence of a mouse in his dream, this means that the dreamer has a distinctive personality and status, and therefore should To strive hard to achieve different goals and benefits. Interpretation of a dream about seeing cats in a dream. As for the second case in which you see cats chasing mice in a dream and then defeating and devouring them, this sometimes means that the dreamer has been in a bad psychological state for a long time and still believes that this state will remain in his control, and will not He can escape from it. The dreamer doubts that this bad period that he is going through will end and he is now at a new turn in order to return to practicing his normal life, in addition to that in the event that there are many family problems and disputes, then after that. A person saw this dream in a dream, and this indicates the near end of these various problems, regardless of their number. Interpretation of seeing a cat chasing a mouse in a dream for a single woman. There are many questions about the interpretation of seeing a cat chasing a mouse in a dream for single women, but the interpretation is the same and similar in Different situations, single or married, and from here it follows that the interpretation of the vision lies in the fact that the dreamer was in a bad psychological state for a fundamentally long time, and moreover he believed that this state that he was going through would control him and accompany him for life and that he would not be able To get out of this situation or a situation similar to it, but if he sees a dream, this indicates the end of this situation soon, and that he will return to practicing it, as he lives a very normal life later. Interpretation of a dream about mice for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a mouse in a dream for a married woman is as follows: Interpretation of a vision A married woman in a dream with mice or seeing a mouse, in addition to specifying the color of the mouse in the dream, this indicates two situations, so that the first case is that the mouse is white running and playing next to the married woman and she was not afraid of it.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing a machine gun in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a gun in a dream is one of the exciting dreams that many people repeat, as it is known that the gun is a tool for self-defense and for fighting the enemy and defeating him, so the vision can come to a person’s dream, whether a man, woman, or girl, with praise and other meanings that are not praise. This determines what the dreamer saw in his visions, so we will tell you the most important interpretations and explanations related to dreaming about a machine gun in a dream. Seeing a machine gun in a dream Dreaming about a gun in a dream shows the concepts of strength, endurance, and a person’s ability to bear all the difficult events he faces in his life and the wisdom he has in life.Woman A married woman who sees a sharp weapon in a dream shows the stability of her family and the psychological comfort she enjoys in life, as well as the kind and gentle treatment between her and her husband. Seeing a machine gun in a dream is one of the good interpretations that indicate goodness, grace, and personal and practical success for the pioneer. Seeing a machine gun in a dream By Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a machine gun in a dream has many meanings. It indicates power, exploiting people, bad intentions, falling into family disputes, or facing a financial problem. The dream also indicates peace of mind, marriage, or health. It is said that A gun in a dream indicates strength and stability. As for whoever dreams of carrying a weapon, he will triumph over his enemies and defeat them. It is said that seeing a Kalashnikov in a dream indicates power and prestige, while dreaming of a machine gun indicates wide status and fame among people. As for seeing someone carrying a weapon in a dream and the ability to Using it, this is evidence that the dreamer will meet his needs and desires. Seeing a machine gun in Nabulsi’s dream. Shooting a gun in a dream can be a sign of rejection of some things or events that a person is going through in his life. But if one sees in a dream that he has lost control over firing Fire, it symbolizes insecurity. Seeing a gun in a dream indicates some unpleasant things. If the dreamer sees gunfire in the dream, this is a sign of betrayal. A gun in a sick person’s dream is a sign of recovery and recovery. Also, the interpretation of a weapon may indicate the right Things, repairing them, religion or good morals. If the dreamer is already afraid that something that is not good or bad will happen and he sees that he is carrying a weapon, then this fear will end and peace and peace of mind will take its place. The specialized online dream interpretation site features a selection of the best dream interpreters And the vision in the Arab world. To access it, type online dream interpretation site on Google. Seeing a machine gun in a dream for a single woman Seeing a machine gun in a dream for a single woman shows the strength, independence and perseverance of this insight in making decisions regarding her life without allowing anyone to interfere in it. An automatic rifle in a dream for an unmarried woman shows the qualities Good in this girl such as strength, honesty, chastity, chastity and determination. This vision can also indicate that there are many problems with the family

title: Interpretation of seeing a wall in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of the wall in a dream and its meaning in different cases. Dreams are generally characterized by mystery and curiosity, as the dreamer does not know what symbols and connotations come from this dream and wants to discover... There are visions that have different meanings for the dreamer, whether good or bad. There are other visions that are nothing but meaningless dreams to the dreamer. In general, dream indicators express important events in the dreamer’s life, whether they are happy events such as marriage, getting a job, or the opportunity to travel, or undesirable events such as illness. Or a big problem in general, but what about the consequences of seeing a wall in a dream? This is what we will learn in the encyclopedia. A wall in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the wall in a dream. Ibn Sirin presented many interpretations of this dream according to the situation, and one of its most important connotations is that it indicates the dreamer’s personality in reality, as it He has a strong personality and the ability to take responsibility. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the wall has many holes in different parts of it, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will fall ill or feel sad and anxious. In the event that you see a solid wall, this vision expresses status The high quality that the viewer enjoys in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is demolishing a wall with a hammer, this is an unpleasant vision for him and indicates his resignation from his job. If the wall collapses without the dreamer’s intervention, then this vision indicates the dreamer’s failure to overcome his enemies in reality. If A dreamer dreamed that he was carrying a wall, then this vision symbolizes the commitment to obey God and adherence to moral values. Breaking a wall in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a wall cracked as a sign of loss of dignity and pride. If you see a cracked and broken wall in a dream, this vision explains Financial benefits that the dreamer obtains from his profits at work. If a dreamer dreams of a cracked wall and tries to escape from it before it collapses on him, then this vision expresses a change in his situation for the better. As for the vision of a sound wall in which cracks will appear soon, this vision is not desirable. In it, it indicates differences and problems in the life of the fortuneteller. In the event that small cracks are seen in the dream, this vision expresses that the dreamer is going through a financial crisis, but in the event that he sees many cracks in the walls of the house, this vision indicates the emergence of a major financial crisis for him. The dreamer. Cleaning the wall in a dream. In the case of cleaning the wall, this vision indicates a benefit that the dreamer wants from someone in reality, and this vision is promising for the dreamer and indicates goodness and happiness in reality. If the dreamer is suffering from worries and problems that are bothering him in reality, then this vision indicates the coming of comfort and the death of sorrows. In fact, the interpretation of seeing a wall in a dream for a single woman. There are many interpretations of this dream for an unmarried girl. To see her looking at the old wall in a dream is an unpleasant vision for her, and indicates failure in achieving what she aspires to. This vision is a sign of distinction and success, whether In the classroom

title: Interpretation of a dream about apricot juice

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about apricot juice. Apricots have a wonderful and distinctive taste, but what does it mean to see apricot juice in a dream? This is what we will answer next. Interpretation of a dream about apricot juice in a dream. When a married man sees himself drinking apricot juice in a dream, this indicates the stability of his financial situation. Drinking apricot juice for a married woman can also indicate an imminent end to the financial crisis. When a girl sees it, this is a sign of stable conditions. FinanceIt also indicates a bright and bright future for the girl. Interpretation of the dream of seeing apricot pits in a dream. If the dreamer sees an apricot pit in a dream, this is an indication of good things for the student. If a married man sees an apricot pit in a dream, this is evidence of the presence of children. Likewise, if the public sees it, this is an indication of the young man’s desire to Marriage, stability, and having a family and children. Interpretation of a dream about planting apricots in a dream. Planting apricots for a married man can indicate raising children and the health of the offspring. When a married woman sees that she is planting apricots in a dream, this may mean that she is vulnerable to diseases. It may also indicate that the dreamer will gain money and wealth in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream Green apricots in a dreamIf the dreamer thinks that he is eating fresh green apricots, this means that he will get money. If an unmarried girl sees herself eating fresh green apricots, this indicates that she has received a large inheritance. When a married woman sees herself eating green apricots, this indicates pregnancy or a lot of Nutrition for her When a pregnant woman sees green apricots in a dream, this is a sign of kindness. Interpretation of a dream about drinking Qamar al-Din juice in a dream. Seeing yourself drinking Qamar al-Din juice in a dream is a sign of happiness and joy. If a girl sees a bowl of Qamar al-Din juice in a dream, it means treating and curing diseases. If a pregnant woman sees herself Qamar Al-Din eats in a dream, this is evidence that she is blessed with food and money. It can also indicate the comfort that a married woman experiences. Interpretation of a dream about fresh apricots in a dream. When a married man sees himself eating fresh apricots in a dream, this indicates his pursuit of money. If a young man sees fresh apricots in a dream, This may indicate a new job. Fresh apricots show the general girl her desire for a new job. When a married woman sees fresh apricots in a dream, this indicates a new pregnancy for her. Interpretation of a dream about picking apricots in a dream. Scholars differed about picking apricots in a dream, as some reported that it indicates fears and bad friends that could It indicates walking on the path of sins, disobedience, and forbidden gains. Others argued that picking apricots in a dream is a sign of happiness and joy, whether they are green or red, while if the dreamer sees picking yellow apricots in a dream, this indicates illness and stress. Interpretation of a dream about apricots in a dream. If a married man sees red apricots in a dream This is a sign of contentment and contentment. Likewise, if a young man sees a red apricot, this indicates a romantic relationship for the girl. Red apricots show a married woman a feeling of love.
